seo.whatIsDestinyPal: What is DestinyPal? AI-Powered Destiny & Personality Analysis Platform
seo.intro: DestinyPal is a comprehensive fortune analysis platform that combines Eastern Saju (Four Pillars) with Western Astrology. Using artificial intelligence, we provide deep analysis of your destiny flow, personality traits, aptitudes, and relationships based on your birth date and time. Ancient Eastern and Western wisdom meets modern AI technology to deliver practical insights for your life.
seo.sajuDescription: Saju (Four Pillars of Destiny) is the premier Eastern system for analyzing fate based on birth year, month, day, and hour. Composed of four pillars (Year, Month, Day, Hour) and eight characters (Heavenly Stems and Earthly Branches), it examines the generative and destructive relationships of the Five Elements (Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, Water) to understand innate tendencies and life flow. DestinyPal visualizes expert-level Saju analysis in an easy-to-understand format. Through Daeun (10-year luck cycles) and annual fortune analysis, we predict life changes for each period and comprehensively diagnose career, wealth, love, and health.
seo.astrologyDescription: Western Astrology analyzes personality and destiny through celestial positions at birth. It considers 12 zodiac signs, planetary positions (Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, etc.), house systems, and aspects between planets. DestinyPal precisely calculates your natal chart, analyzing key points like the Ascendant, Midheaven (MC), Descendant, and IC. Your Sun sign represents core personality, Moon sign reveals emotional nature, and Ascendant shows your outer image - together forming a complex personality profile.
seo.tarotDescription: Tarot is a mystical tool of 78 cards that analyzes current situations and illuminates the future. 22 Major Arcana cards symbolize major life turning points and spiritual growth, while 56 Minor Arcana cards address everyday situations. DestinyPal offers various spreads including Past-Present-Future, Celtic Cross, and Relationship spreads, with AI connecting card symbolism to your specific situation for deep interpretation. For love, career, finances, health - Tarot provides intuitive insights for all life questions.
seo.compatibilityDescription: Compatibility analysis compares two people's Saju and zodiac signs to predict relationship harmony and potential conflicts. Saju compatibility examines the combining and clashing relationships of Day Masters, Five Elements interactions, and special star interactions. Astrological compatibility considers elemental harmony of Sun signs, Venus-Mars love style compatibility, and Moon sign emotional compatibility. DestinyPal analyzes not just romantic compatibility, but also marital, business partnership, friendship, and parent-child relationships, providing practical advice for understanding others and developing relationships.
seo.calendarDescription: The Fortune Calendar is a powerful tool for tracking daily fortune changes and identifying important dates in advance. It integrates daily auspicious and inauspicious indicators, planetary transits, retrograde cycles, and moon phases. Choose favorable days for weddings, business openings, moving, or contracts, and avoid challenging days. DestinyPal's AI combines your personal Saju with current planetary positions to generate customized daily fortunes, with detailed advice for career, finances, love, and health.
seo.howToUseDescription: Using DestinyPal is simple. First, enter your exact birth date and time. If uncertain about time, you can select an approximate range - more precise times yield more accurate analysis. Adding birthplace information enables precise house system calculations for astrology. Once input is complete, AI calculates your Saju, analyzes celestial positions, and generates a comprehensive destiny report. View your Five Elements balance, planetary chart, and luck cycle timeline on the dashboard, clicking each section for detailed interpretations. Use our AI chat feature to ask questions and receive real-time answers.
seo.privacyDescription: DestinyPal protects your personal information and fortune data with the highest level of security. All data is encrypted and stored with strict access controls to prevent unauthorized access. Personal information is never shared with third parties without consent, and you can delete your data anytime. Anonymous mode allows basic fortune analysis without an account, so you can experience the service without privacy concerns. We strictly comply with GDPR and domestic privacy laws, maintaining security through regular audits.
seo.freeVsPremiumDescription: DestinyPal offers free users basic Saju analysis, Western astrology charts, daily fortunes, and Tarot readings. Premium membership unlocks advanced features: 10-year luck cycle analysis, annual predictions, detailed compatibility reports, personalized AI consultations, unlimited Tarot readings, and PDF report downloads. Premium users receive priority support and beta tester access to new features. Choose between monthly and annual subscriptions, with up to 30% discount on annual plans. Try premium features free for 7 days.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions below
faq.footer: Still have questions? Contact us through the Contact page.
faq.a1: DestinyPal is an AI-powered platform that combines multiple divination systems including Astrology, Saju (Four Pillars), Tarot, I Ching, Dream Interpretation, and Numerology to provide personalized insights.
faq.a2: Yes! Basic features are free to use. Premium features like detailed AI consultations and unlimited readings are available through our subscription plans.
faq.a3: Our readings use traditional divination principles combined with AI analysis. They are for entertainment and self-reflection purposes, not professional advice. Accuracy depends on the quality of input information.
faq.q4: Do I need to know my birth time?
faq.a4: For Saju and detailed Astrology readings, knowing your exact birth time gives more accurate results. However, many features work without it.
faq.a5: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures. We do not sell your personal information. See our Privacy Policy for details.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
faq.a7: Currently we support Korean and English.
